title: La Gastronomia Veg
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Italian, Salad bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Originally opened in 2000 as Gastronomia Vegetariana, this all-vegan deli and grocery offers a wide range of all-vegan dishes and fresh baked goods. It also sells both packaged and unpackaged organic food including pasta, grains, pulses, fair trade chocolate and teas, and regularly hosts themed evenings and cooking classes.
